column4: Omg, i leave for a few minutes, screen turns off, i turn it back on and Vista is ALL messed up, what a peice of garbage -_-, cant wait till ubuntu is done downloading
why did you waste money on vista? how much did you spend?
i spent $429 for the computer at Best Buy
i bout crapped myself when i saw that LOL, it was like "restart when you need to" and i was like, You mean no "must restart computer" messages!?!? lol
